about:
Hi, I’m Sai Lokesh Reddy Gayam, a results-driven Full Stack Developer based in San Francisco, CA. Experienced in leading projects, I’ve developed innovative business intelligence software, reducing errors by 30%. Skilled in API development, I’ve integrated external APIs from industry giants like Amazon, enhancing user satisfaction by 20%.


 Currently pursuing my Masters in Computer Science, I’m proficient in FastAPI, ReactJS, AWS, JavaScript, Java, and Python.


 I value collaboration and hold certifications in Google Analytics, Data Science, Python, and Front-End Web UI Frameworks. Let’s connect and explore tech possibilities!
